message: iCloud isn't going to sync OS X Keychains. :( iDisk is going away also. I can't be the only one that uses them.
I use my iDisk daily.  It will be missed. :(
Oophs! If only I could remember the web address. http://web.me.com/egchouston/Portfolio

As a designer, I am pleased to produce an iPad friendly website with "Consumer" grade software & without  hiring personnel. http://web.me.com/egchouston.com, http://web.me.com/egchouston/Blog.
I'll probably migrate my iDisk to dropbox and the curl up in a corner and weep. I like iDisk a lot, even though I hardly use it since leaving freelance to go full time.
